product.longDescription: This collection includes ten seeds each of the Artisan Tomato™ varieties, individually packaged, so you can select how many plants of each variety you want. Includes Lucky Tiger, Blush, Sunrise Bumble Bee, Pink Bumble Bee, and Purple Bumble Bee. Does not include Pink Tiger. Indeterminate. USDA Certified Organic. Varies.
product.shortDescription: Exclusive! All the flavors and colors of the Artisan Tomatoes™ family.

Artisan Tomato™ Collection Organic Tomato Seed

Product ID:3980G.03980G

This collection includes ten seeds each of the Artisan Tomato™ varieties, individually packaged, so you can select how many plants of each variety you want. Includes Lucky Tiger, Blush, Sunrise Bumble Bee, Pink Bumble Bee, and Purple Bumble Bee. Does not include Pink Tiger. Indeterminate. USDA Certified Organic. Varies.
